post_content:
I’ll have these cards for sale at the Chicago Nationals this year on Wednesday and Thursday. Attached is the link to my Flickr album with pictures of the cards and a picture of the asking prices. They will be available to ship out after nationals. If interested feel free to reach out at 8153436260 or pm me.
